thread.title: BREAKING: 200 police storm US hospital to detain 'active shooter
thread.title_full: BREAKING: 200 police storm US hospital to detain 'active shooter

title: BREAKING: 200 police storm US hospital to detain 'active shooter
text:
BREAKING: 200 police storm US hospital to detain 'active shooter BREAKING: 200 police storm US hospital to detain 'active shooter MORE than 200 police officers, some armed with assault rifles, have been deployed at Ben Taub hospital in Houston, Texas. PUBLISHED: 20:54, Tue, Feb 21, 2017 | UPDATED: 21:09, Tue, Feb 21, 2017 PH More than 200 police officers attended the scene, some armed with assault rifles 
Patients were evacuated from the building as staff rushed them to the exits of the hospital which homes a trauma centre with more than 40 beds. 
One witness said he “heard them screaming 'code white'" – the call enforced to tell any employees outside of the hospital to stay away due to an emergency. 
Another added: "The doctors came in and said that there had been shots fired on the second floor. PH
